file_content.text: Welcome to Giradda the Hutt's Arena of Death! I'm your Deathmaster, Baron Deathmark!
Two teams have been assembled at random--Rotworms and Frog-Dogs!
First team to destroy the other team wins each round! Once you're down, you're out till the round's over!
Frog-Dogs! Rotworms! Get in there and go berserk!
A Frog-Dog annihilated a Rotworm!
A Rotworm just obliterated a Frog-Dog!
Bammo! That Rotworm was born to kill Frog-Dogs!
That Frog-Dog is salky kibble! Rotworms rack up a score!
You could see that Rotworm's kill from space!
Frog-Dog down! Frog-Dog down!
Frog-Dogs are taking it to the Rotworms! What a kill!
Rotworm eradicated! Frog-Dogs on the warpath!
Who's a good Rotworm killer? That Frog-Dog is!
Bad day to be a Rotworm!
Only two combatants remain! Who will avenge their fallen teammates and take the round?
That round belongs to the Rotworms!
The round is over! Frog-Dogs took that one!
Time's almost up this round--and there's a tie! No ties!
This round is tied! It's time for sudden death!
Next round's about to start! Ready... set... go rack up some kills!
With one round remaining, the score is tied! Who will win the match?
Frog-Dogs win! They wasted the Rotworms!
Frog-Dogs are the victors--and barely a scratch on them! Perfect win!
Game over! Rotworms humiliate the Frog-Dogs!
Rotworms secure the win without a single point against them! Flawless!
Giradda thanks you for your brutality! Play again sometime!
Time for another round. Time for pain!
Did you fail your teammates last round? Here's your chance to do it again! New round!
Who will be the winners? Who will be the corpses? Audience, place your bets!
